experience.title: Credit Risk Analyst - SME Division
experience.description: Kotak Mahindra is one of the biggest nationalized private banks offering a wide range of banking products and financial services to corporate and retail customers in the areas of personal finance, investment, banking, life insurance, and wealth management.Worked as a Credit Risk Analyst in the SME Division of Kotak Mahindra. The internship revolved about preparing market research and financial reports, critically examining the financials and benchmarking them for credit lending in Small and Medium Scale Enterprises.• Developed an Industry Research Report on Indian polymer market; estimated the market performance and rating rationale.• Conducted a comparative and value chain analysis to determine client' credit -worthiness and financial performance.•Formulated a Credit Risk Assessment Note and evaluated Kotak's risk exposure for a credit funding of INR 25 million.
experience.description_html: Kotak Mahindra is one of the biggest nationalized private banks offering a wide range of banking products and financial services to corporate and retail customers in the areas of personal finance, investment, banking, life insurance, and wealth management.Worked as a Credit Risk Analyst in the SME Division of Kotak Mahindra. The internship revolved about preparing market research and financial reports, critically examining the financials and benchmarking them for credit lending in Small and Medium Scale Enterprises.• Developed an Industry Research Report on Indian polymer market; estimated the market performance and rating rationale.• Conducted a comparative and value chain analysis to determine client' credit -worthiness and financial performance.•Formulated a Credit Risk Assessment Note and evaluated Kotak's risk exposure for a credit funding of INR 25 million.

experience.title: Investment Banking Analyst - M&A and Strategic Advisory
experience.description: Meghraj Capital Advisors is an international investment banking advisory and infrastructure consulting organisation, managing over USD 30 Billion of client's assets.Worked as a Buy-Side Analyst: Industry Research, fundamental analysis and company valuations for a cross-border M&A deal.  • Performed an in-depth market research of the Indian polymer industry: a.  Sector analysisb.  Market attractivenessc.  Porter's 5 Forces analysisd. Comparable analysis e.  Precedent transaction analysisf.  McKinsey/GE matrixg. BCG growth-share matrix• Developed 30+ company profiles spanning over PVC manufacturing and Specialty Polymers for potential acquisitions.• Examined companies’ financial ratios (profitability, activity, solvency, liquidity, valuation) and forecasted Balance Sheets & Income Statements till 2021.• Modeled end-to-end valuations of 8 (public and private) companies via comparable company and DCF analysis across a span of 10 years from 2012-2021.
experience.description_html: Meghraj Capital Advisors is an international investment banking advisory and infrastructure consulting organisation, managing over USD 30 Billion of client's assets.Worked as a Buy-Side Analyst: Industry Research, fundamental analysis and company valuations for a cross-border M&A deal. • Performed an in-depth market research of the Indian polymer industry: a. Sector analysisb. Market attractivenessc. Porter's 5 Forces analysisd. Comparable analysis e. Precedent transaction analysisf. McKinsey/GE matrixg. BCG growth-share matrix• Developed 30+ company profiles spanning over PVC manufacturing and Specialty Polymers for potential acquisitions.• Examined companies’ financial ratios (profitability, activity, solvency, liquidity, valuation) and forecasted Balance Sheets & Income Statements till 2021.• Modeled end-to-end valuations of 8 (public and private) companies via comparable company and DCF analysis across a span of 10 years from 2012-2021.

experience.title: Remote Research Assistant- Marketing Management
experience.description: Worked as a Remote Research Assistant under Prof Sameer Mathur, Marketing Management, IIM LucknowThe project  primarily focused on learning and implementing the basic concepts of Marketing Management: STP analysis, 4P's, Value Proposition, Customer Relationship, Pricing Strategy, Competitive Marketing, Distribution Strategy and Integrated Market Communications• Analyzed 2 Harvard Business Review (HBR) case studies and designed a marketing deck for Zara.• Conceptualized a full-fledged marketing plan for ShopClues- STP analysis, go-to-market strategy.• Examined various marketing strategies implemented by global companies like Apple, ITC, etc.
experience.description_html: Worked as a Remote Research Assistant under Prof Sameer Mathur, Marketing Management, IIM LucknowThe project primarily focused on learning and implementing the basic concepts of Marketing Management: STP analysis, 4P's, Value Proposition, Customer Relationship, Pricing Strategy, Competitive Marketing, Distribution Strategy and Integrated Market Communications• Analyzed 2 Harvard Business Review (HBR) case studies and designed a marketing deck for Zara.• Conceptualized a full-fledged marketing plan for ShopClues- STP analysis, go-to-market strategy.• Examined various marketing strategies implemented by global companies like Apple, ITC, etc.

experience.title: Digital Marketing and Corporate Sales Strategist
experience.description: Got an opportunity to work with a growth-stage startup OfBusiness is a technology-driven SME financing platform that adds value to SMEs in manufacturing and infrastructure sector business beyond financing through its raw material fulfillment engine and secured and unsecured credit lines.• Established Google Analytics by preparing dashboards depicting user acquisition, traffic analysis,goals & completions and conversions by including the KPI, metrics & segmentation.• Facilitated the affiliate marketing campaign by designing the basic structure of display ads, pop-up pages & offer pages and successfully on-boarded several affiliate networks.• Did a thorough study of the e-mail marketing & lead nurturing campaign, prepared e-mailers for our iron & steel clients and assisted in partnering a few e-mail vendors and an e-mail marketing platform (Netcore).•Conducted a detailed market analysis of the Indian polymer market and was part of the head sales team, handled daily queries,  interacted with clients (both online and offline), did sales pitch and closely monitored company's revenue
experience.description_html: Got an opportunity to work with a growth-stage startup OfBusiness is a technology-driven SME financing platform that adds value to SMEs in manufacturing and infrastructure sector business beyond financing through its raw material fulfillment engine and secured and unsecured credit lines.• Established Google Analytics by preparing dashboards depicting user acquisition, traffic analysis,goals & completions and conversions by including the KPI, metrics & segmentation.• Facilitated the affiliate marketing campaign by designing the basic structure of display ads, pop-up pages & offer pages and successfully on-boarded several affiliate networks.• Did a thorough study of the e-mail marketing & lead nurturing campaign, prepared e-mailers for our iron & steel clients and assisted in partnering a few e-mail vendors and an e-mail marketing platform (Netcore).•Conducted a detailed market analysis of the Indian polymer market and was part of the head sales team, handled daily queries, interacted with clients (both online and offline), did sales pitch and closely monitored company's revenue

projects: [{"title":"Bull Whip effect modeling","start_date":"Jan 2017","end_date":"Apr 2017","description":"• Forecasted Bull Whip Effect via AR(1)MA modeling; conducted sensitivity analysis for supply chain parameters.• Enhanced demand forecasting accuracy and reduced lead time by incorporating customer behavior & price fluctuations.Project Supervisor: Dr. P. Jha(Associate Professor, Department of Chemical Engineering, IIT Roorkee)"},{"title":"Pollution abatement measures and it's economic modeling aspects ","start_date":"Jan 2017","end_date":"Mar 2017","description":"• Modeled Delhi's air pollution data using Time Series Analysis across 60 weeks; achieved an error limit of 8%.• Critically analyzed Delhi's Odd-Even Scheme and drafted a pollution abatement proposal to reduce emissions.Project Supervisor: Dr. Basheshwar Prasad(Professor, Department of Chemical Engineering, IIT Roorkee)"},{"title":"Waste to Energy","start_date":"Nov 2015","end_date":"Dec 2015","description":"•The project aimed at converting the organic food waste and dairy waste into biogas and biodiesel via anaerobic digester and algae photobioreactor.•A theoretical model was designed and modelled using MATLAB for the same.Project Supervisor: Dr. Prasonjit Mondal (Assistant Professor, Department of Chemical Engineering, IIT Roorkee)"},{}]
